Uses of Class
ProjectGameVer3.Role

    • Uses of Role in ProjectGameVer3

      Subclasses of Role in ProjectGameVer3 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Assasin 
      class  Beserker 
      class  Cleric 
      class  Defender 
      class  Duelist 
      class  Hero 
      class  Manticore 
      class  Monk
      The monk by default has a dodge chance of 33%.This is the specialty of the monk.
      class  Monster 
      class  Mummy 
      class  Ogre
      The Class defines a monster Ogre who inherits the same characteristics as a monster.
      class  Orc
      Orc is a special monster that can double its attack power on knocking out an opponent and get healed.
      class  Paladin 
      class  Rogue 
      class  Slime 
      class  Spider 
      class  Warrior 
      Methods in ProjectGameVer3 with parameters of type Role 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Spider.attack(Role opponent)
      The attack of the spider is redefined as the spider can either attack or poison (a 50% chance of each) When attacked an opponent can retaliate but when poisoned by Spider they can't.
      void Slime.attack(Role opponent)
      This function changes the skip and goo parameter of the victim of Slime.
      void Role.attack(Role opponent)
      A default function of attack
      void Rogue.attack(Role opponent)
      The specialty of Rogue is that , a Rogue can poison a monster for 3 turns i.e set poison to 3 .There are more if statements for better string outputs to make the story more precise.
      void Orc.attack(Role opponent) 
      void Mummy.attack(Role opponent) 
      void Monster.attack(Role opponent)
      This is a simple function of attack where the poison is checked and the opponent gets attacked.
      void Hero.attack(Role opponent)
      Function Attack of a hero needs to check if they are to skip a turn and also it helps to un-tag heroes from the "(goo)" tag.
      void Cleric.attack(Role hero)
      Redefined attack, as the Cleric heals instead of attacking.The function removes all tags, and all parameters are rest to default state.This function is similar to stage revive but to make the game more interactive the function has differnt strings to display.
      void Beserker.attack(Role opponent) 
      void Role.getAttacked(Role opponent)
      Helps to judge the characters dodge capability and it is the main function used to define attack in sub classes of Role.This is function is the opposite of attack where the function decides what the Role that gets attacked does.
      void Monster.getAttacked(Role opponent)
      Though getAttacked is nearly the same function in monsters compared to Role class, to change the strings that are displayed, the the method has been redefined.
      void Defender.getAttacked(Role opponent) 
      void Role.retalliation(Role opponent)
      The function judges the retaliation capability.
